item.title: Health Buddy (Web application)
item.description:
This project was part of my internship at IITK Summer of Code organised by the Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering. The technical details are as follows -

  • Received intensive training in technologies involved in Full-Stack Development.
  • Developed a web based platform which would make the entire process of the local health centre paper-free and improve the overall experience of a visit.
  • Created separate end-points for various departments like reception, doctor, patient, pharmacy, etc.
  • Efficient database handling for pharmacy to log in the inventory.
  • Used Django framework in python as the backend framework and HTML, CSS, JS and Bootstrap for frontend development.
  • PostgreSQL was used as the database manager.
